IndexPage.title: IVANCOM — parcels that bring people closer
IndexPage.description: Fast delivery of parcels from Ukraine to Poland, EU countries and back — hassle-free

question1.question: How to send a parcel from Ukraine abroad?
question1.answer:
Your shipments pass through our warehouse in Hostyntseve (Lviv region).

Send your parcel via Nova Poshta:

Lviv region, Hostyntseve village, branch №1

Recipient: FOP Kysil Liudmyla Anatoliivna

EDRPOU: 3221718269

Phone: +380 (95) 801-04-74

question2.question: How do we calculate delivery time from Ukraine abroad?
question2.answer:
Delivery time is calculated from the moment your parcel leaves our Ukrainian warehouse (Hostyntseve, Lviv region).
Minimum time – from 2 days (we work every day).

question3.question: Is my parcel insured and how much does it cost?
question3.answer:
Absolutely!

  • All parcels from Ukraine to Poland are insured, insurance fee is 3% of the declared value on Nova Poshta.
  • All parcels from Poland to Ukraine are insured, insurance fee is 1% of the declared value.

This mandatory insurance protects your parcel.

question4.question: How to reduce shipping cost from Ukraine?
question4.answer:
If your parcel is packed at the post office, carefully check that the packaging size matches the real size of your parcel! Every extra cm adds cost:(

Don’t hesitate to ask the operator to resize the box if it’s too big — you have the right!

Want to cut the box yourself? Watch this video!

question5.question: Who should pay for the shipment?
question5.answer:
• If the parcel is going from Ukraine, it can be paid by sender or recipient.
  • If the parcel is going to Ukraine, it must be paid by the sender only.

question6.question: What is prohibited to ship from Ukraine to the EU?
question6.answer:
• Alcohol,
  • tobacco (in any form) and e-cigarettes,
  • precious metals,
  • cash,
  • meat and lard,
  • dairy products,
  • fish caviar,
  • fur items, etc.


    • Parcels with prohibited items are returned to sender at their expense.

question7.question: Can I send a high-value parcel to Ukraine?
question7.answer:
Yes, you can. If parcel value exceeds 1000 PLN, an extra fee applies — 10% of the amount above 1000 PLN.

Example:

1500 PLN - 1000 PLN = 500 PLN × 10% = 50 PLN (surcharge).
This is added to your tariff.

question8.question: How to order from a Ukrainian online store and deliver to Europe?
question8.answer:
When placing your order:

  • Enter this delivery info:

    Nova Poshta, Lviv region, Hostyntseve village, branch №1 (up to 1000 kg and size 70x170x300 cm).
    Recipient: FOP Kysil Liudmyla Anatoliivna
    EDRPOU: 3221718269
    +380 (95) 801-04-74.

  • Fill in our form — so we’ll know where to deliver your parcel :)
  • When the parcel reaches Poland, you’ll get an SMS from IVANCOM.

delivery.courierTitle: Send with ease: courier and InPost parcel lockers
delivery.courierDescription: IVANCOM offers fast and reliable courier delivery in Poland, operating in major cities like Warsaw, Krakow, Wrocław and others. Your parcels don’t go through terminals, which minimizes damage risk. Ukrainian-speaking couriers make communication easy. In some cities, parcel pickup is free. Ordering is simple — contact the IVANCOM office in your city, and we’ll handle the rest!
delivery.inpostDescription: Send parcels from Poland to Ukraine anytime — lockers work 24/7. Just fill in your data, get a code, put the parcel into the nearest locker — done! The parcel is tracked all the way, and the recipient can pick it up from Nova Poshta or get courier delivery. Choose the most convenient way with the best rates!

about.careTrustTitle: Care and trust in every journey
about.careTrustPart1: We’re a family-run logistics company that turned delivery into a life mission. Since 2017, we’ve helped thousands of people travel safely and comfortably between Ukraine and Poland.
about.careTrustPart2: Our services aren’t just parcel delivery, document handling, or pet transportation — they’re all about caring for your needs and providing top service. We support the Ukrainian Armed Forces, do charity work, and always help those in need. Learn more about our story, values, and team.

Calendar.title: How to speed up your shipment?
Calendar.intro: Time is valuable! Want your parcels to be dispatched quickly and smoothly? Here are a few simple tips to ship more efficiently.
Calendar.moreInfo: Learn how to optimize the process — check our page.
Calendar.followUs: And don’t forget to follow us on socials — we post updates and shipping hacks there.

Main.title: Learn about the tariffs and delivery steps for parcels from Ukraine to Poland and the EU: fast, reliable, affordable.
attention: The following items are prohibited for shipment from Ukraine to the EU: meat products, canned meat, lard, dairy products, vegetables and fruits, plants, mushrooms, caviar, infant formula, alcohol, tobacco products, electronic cigarettes, money, fur, antiques, large auto parts, industrial machinery.
If these prohibited items are found in a parcel, IVANCOM staff reserve the right to dispose of them or return them to the sender at their own expense.
The weight on the Nova Poshta waybill remains unchanged, and the final delivery cost is calculated based on the initial weight.
attention1: Delivery cost is calculated based on volumetric or actual weight, whichever is greater. Important: excess space in the box may increase the price, as the calculation uses the weight indicated in the Nova Poshta transport document.
If discrepancies are found, our representative reserves the right to reweigh the parcel.
The company does not consolidate multiple waybills into one parcel.

Calculator.title: Delivery Calculator
Calculator.description: Choose the direction for which you want to use the calculator:

about.headline: We are the IVANCOM family!
about.description: We help Ukrainians feel closer, receiving care and warmth from loved ones through parcels from all over the world
about.logistics_journey: Behind the Scenes of Logistics: The Journey of Your Parcel
about.titleTeam: Let's get to know each other better!
about.contentTeam:
Since opening our first office in Krakow on December 2, 2020, IVANCOM has grown into a true family where everyone finds support and understanding. We help send parcels to Ukraine, organize the delivery of medicines, documents, and goods, provide pet transportation, relocations, and other logistics services.

During this time, our team has grown to over 40 employees, we have 5 stationary branches in Poland (Katowice, Krakow, Warsaw, Wroclaw, and Gdansk), several mobile branches, our own fleet, and a sorting base in Ukraine. We have already survived the pandemic, and now, as much as we can, we help the Armed Forces of Ukraine accelerate victory. Throughout all this time, we have been actively volunteering and supporting not only the army but also people and even animals – because for us, it is important to be humane, to provide care and support to everyone who needs it.

Join our IVANCOM family and share our belief in Ukraine's bright future!
about.titleStrong: Together – Stronger: Helping Those in Need!
about.part1Strong: Helping is not just charity; it's a way to be there during the most difficult moments. IVANCOM began its path of volunteering back in 2019, when we supported orphanages, helped animals in shelters, and collected humanitarian aid for those who found themselves in difficult life situations.
about.part2Strong: When dark times came for Ukraine, we did not stand aside. During the first days of the full-scale war, our team organized the evacuation of women, children, and the elderly from hotspots, provided assistance to displaced people, and delivered humanitarian aid to the most dangerous regions. We raised funds to purchase vehicles, military equipment, thermal imagers, and medicines for our defenders.
about.part3Strong: But volunteering is not only about helping during wartime. It’s about continuously caring for those in need. We support children's hospitals, help people in need, organize donation drives for displaced persons, and feed animals in shelters. We know that every good deed matters.
about.part4Strong: Join our initiative. Together, we can change the world for the better!
about.text1: We transported a surgical trailer and an off-road vehicle to the Zaporizhzhia direction
about.text2: Our friends from all over the world helped with this and made a short film.
about.partnersText: We collaborate with reliable companies all over the world.

inpost.titleHero: Fast delivery from Poland to Ukraine with InPost

main.sendTitle: Where to send a parcel in Poland?
main.sendDesc: You can send a parcel via the nearest InPost parcel locker. Just choose a convenient location, drop off your parcel — and we'll handle the delivery to Ukraine!
main.receiveTitle: Where to receive a parcel in Ukraine?
main.receiveDesc: You can receive a parcel in Ukraine:
receiveOptions: By courier to your door (+15 zł)
main.warningDesc1: It is forbidden to send the following through InPost parcel lockers to Ukraine:
main.warningDesc5: • Tobacco products — no more than 1 block
main.stepsDesc: It's very easy — just a few steps:

steps.title: Prepare your parcel for shipment.
steps.desc: Use a sturdy box, secure fragile items, and tape it well. Check our tips to avoid damage.

steps.title: Receive a payment link
steps.desc: An IVANCOM operator will send you a link — just pay online.

steps.title: Use the code received by email to place your parcel in the nearest InPost parcel locker
Track the delivery
steps.desc: You'll receive a Nova Poshta tracking number — use it to track your parcel’s route.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.answer1: You can measure the length, width, and height with a ruler, tape measure, or an A4 sheet (length – 29.7 cm, width – 21 cm).
faq.question2: Where can I get a box?
faq.answer2: You can buy a box in any large store like Auchan, OBI, or Poczta Polska. Or reuse one from previous online orders.
faq.question3: What if the parcel doesn't fit the selected locker size?
faq.answer3: Before entering the locker code (kod nadania), make sure your box fits the selected size. If not — contact our manager. You'll get a new payment link and code for a bigger box.
faq.question4: How to track the parcel via InPost?
faq.answer4: After payment, you’ll get an email with the locker code and Nova Poshta tracking number. Click the ‘Track’ button in the email to check status.
faq.question5: Can I send a parcel without a box?
faq.answer5: It's not recommended — the parcel may be damaged during shipping. A box provides protection from impact, dirt, moisture, and loss.
faq.question6: Why can’t I select a Nova Poshta branch in the form?
faq.answer6: Possible reasons: the parcel size doesn’t match the branch or there's a technical issue. Contact us — we’ll help fix it.
faq.question7: Can I send a parcel via InPost while in Ukraine?
faq.answer7: Unfortunately, it’s not technically possible to send from Ukraine via InPost lockers right now.
faq.question8: Can I send a parcel to a locker in Ukraine?
faq.answer8: No, currently we only deliver to Nova Poshta branches or by courier (extra charge).
faq.question9: What if the InPost locker has no screen for code input?
faq.answer9: No worries! You can enter the code in any locker — not just the one you initially chose.
faq.question10: Can I pay using a Ukrainian bank card?
faq.answer10: Not yet, but we’re working on it — this option will be available soon!

promo.title: Maximize your benefits with every shipment!
promo.description: Take advantage of our promotions and discover even more opportunities.

main.title: Customer Card — your bonus with every shipment!
main.desc1: Get your Customer Card now at any IVANCOM branch and enjoy the benefits.
main.desc2: Once you collect 4 stamps — your next shipment or pickup will get a 50% discount!
main.desc3: Note: the discount does not apply to high-value shipments or medicines.
main.warnDesc1: *The 50% discount applies to one form where the total weight does not exceed 50 kg (volumetric or actual).
main.warnDesc2: *If your parcel exceeds 50 kg, the next stamp will count toward a new form.
main.warnDesc3: *The discount does not cover extra charges (percentage after 1000 zł), insurance, or additional packaging (box, pallet frame, etc.).

soclink.title: Don’t miss out on your perks!
soclink.description: Follow us on social media to be the first to know about new promotions and sweet bonuses.
